definitions.definition: A place of safety or refuge .
The protection, physical and legal, afforded by such a place (as, for example, for political refugees).
A place of protection or restraint for one or more classes of the disadvantaged, especially the mentally ill .

main_definition: A place of safety or refuge .
secondary_definitions: ( uncountable ) The protection, physical and legal, afforded by such a place (as, for example, for political refugees).
( dated ) A place of protection or restraint for one or more classes of the disadvantaged, especially the mentally ill .
